Node.definition: marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= action by which humans carefully examine a certain object or event|= action by which someone carefully examines a group of objects in order to determine whether they meet certain criteria

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= causative action by which someone performs an event
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= affection between people, or between people and deities

Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
hatred (between siblings)

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= things that are considered to be destined to happen to someone
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= state in which people, animals, or objects are considered free from contamination, ► as a result of which the people can interact socially with others and the objects can be put to normal use
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true

Node.gloss: to be afraid|to fear|to be in awe of|to revere
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience fear
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to be done; hence: = process by which certain events take place without observers always having a clear understanding of who is the agent
= things that are considered to be destined to happen to someone
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

Node.gloss: to be filled > to be engaged
Node.definition: literally: to be filled (with an activity); hence: = state in which humans are fully engaged in a certain activity, either as victim or as active participant
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= state in which an action is regarded as abnormal and associated with people who are insane
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to be joined to the living > to be alive
Node.definition: literally: to be joined to the living; hence: = state in which someone is alive and part of a community

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= state in which humans live with confidence and without fear

= relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a pig (חֲזִיר) associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

= process in which information that is stored in one's mind regarding someone or something is being reprocessed continually and/or repeatedly

= process by which humans or deities experience a sentiment of anger with regard to someone else, ◄ because that other person has qualities, privileges, or possessions that one feels one should have as well, or because that person lavishes favors on another party that one feels should be directed to oneself
= a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time, sometimes including an element of surprise

Node.gloss: to perish|to come to an end
Node.definition: = process by which an event comes to an end, usually under unfavorable circumstances
= right or opportunity of humans to partake in a particular event

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to be done; hence: = process by which certain events take place without observers always having a clear understanding of who is the agent
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time, sometimes including an element of surprise
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: at all time; = a long stretch of time, without any interruptions
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= state in which objects are white in color

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

Node.gloss: to lack|to be lacking|to fail|to dry up
Node.definition: = state in which humans or objects are found less in quantity or entirely absent in a location where they are supposed to be present
literally: to see life; hence: = state in which humans experience well being

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= something that happens to someone; ◄ whether or not as recompense for what he/she has done

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: (one's) hands find (something to do); hence: = state in which humans have the opportunity and ability to do something
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= action by which humans exercise their mind (לֵב) with the purpose of achieving something

= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
literally: to go; hence: = process by which living creatures live their life until the moment of death

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which humans, animals, and things have the ability to move or act with speed ◄ due to lack of weight, agility, strength, training, or energy
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

Node.gloss: to be intelligent|to be discerning|to have insight|to be an expert
Node.definition: = state in which someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= state in which humans possess an abundance of valuable goods, ≈ which is usually associated with a high status and considered a blessing from God

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans are endowed with knowledge, often through experience
= state in which humans have a positive and compassionate attitude towards other humans
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)

= combination of two or three nets in layers, usually a small mesh inner net sandwiched between two nets of looser mesh; ► set out vertically in the water, held in place by floats on the surface of the water and weighted down by a single weighted rope at the bottom; left in place for several hours to give time for fish to accumulate in it; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= state of an event or an object that is very difficult or painful or harmful; also used to describe the attitude or emotion in reaction to such an event
= generic term for a small bird; ► usually clean and can therefore be eaten

Node.gloss: to grasp|to take hold of (something)|to seize|to catch|to hold on (to something)
Node.definition: = to take hold of someone or something; humans typically do this with their hands and animals use their mouths; however, it is often extended to include inanimate objects (traps), personalized qualities (wisdom), emotions (anger, fear), or processes (time)
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= causative action by which someone places a net or trap in such a way that it is not readily seen ► for the purpose of catching animals and birds; ≈ associated with aggression and oppression
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
literally: to fall (upon someone); hence: = process by which humans are affected by a certain condition, emotion, or supernatural influence

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which animate or inanimate objects are relatively small in size, ≈ which is sometimes associated with a lack of strength, and with insignificance
= small quantity of objects or substance
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
literally: to go around; hence: = action by which groups of humans or animals take position all around an individual, a group, or an object

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= construction of which the exact form is unknown, ► built in order to gain access to a city during a siege
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place
= state in which humans lack the means to support themselves
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency

Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which humans lack the means to support themselves
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= the ability to accomplish great things because of characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= state in which humans lack the means to support themselves

Node.gloss: to despise|to disdain|to scorn|to consider (something) beneath (oneself)
Node.definition: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else

= state of absence of wisdom, which manifests itself in excessive anger, talking too rashly and too much, sinful behavior, and laziness, ► and results in poverty, shame, punishment, and trouble and grief for other people; ≈ foolishness is thought to reside in a person's heart (לֵב) the behavior and treatment of fools is often compared to that of animals
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= armed conflict in which weapons are used to attack an enemy
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

Node.gloss: to destroy|to corrupt|to put an end
Node.definition: = action by which someone brings an event to an end, usually under unfavorable circumstances
